title: external storage: unable to use another owncloud
body:
i have two owncloud servers running (both 6.0, bet 4).

the usera on servera is defining an external storage on serverb like so:
testimport, owncloud / webdav, servera/remote.php/webdav/, usera, pwd, /home

on serverb, the imported directory shows up right. i can brows all files as expected. however, i can not add new files (neither using the web-frontend nor the sync client). 

as soon as i try to create a file (ie. using new->textfile) on serverb, the /home folder on servera gets a new subfolder called ".". this "." folder however is not a recursive link back to the same folder but contains the folder contents before i was trying to add a new file from serverb. the new file itself does not show up on servera.

serverb shows the correct state of the folder (old content + new file). serverb shows the following in the error-log:

```
core	 can't get app storage, app files_external, user not logged in
webdav client	 resource not found.
webdav client	 resource not found.
webdav client	 resource not found.
webdav client	 resource not found.
```

when i add a new file on servera to the shared directory, the folder on serverb will reset, showing the same content (except for that "."-folder) as serverb does.

edit: 
updated to beta6. still not working. same results except that the "."-folder is not created on servera.
